Title: Udzinarta mze
Actors: Elguja Burduli, David Kazishvili, Lia Babluani, Eka Saatashvili
Plot: The Sun of the Sleepless. The film is about a doctor named Gela Bendeliani (Elgudzha Burduli) and his wealthless family in Tbilisi in Soviet Georgia. In the film Gela Bendeliani has an unlimited capacity for generosity and forgiveness.
